characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a red car, driver of a black car, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through an urban area with multiple lanes. The traffic is moderate, and several vehicles are visible ahead. A cyclist is seen on the left side of the road. The white sedan is moving steadily, while the red car and black car are changing lanes.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and staying in its lane. The driver is cautious due to the presence of multiple vehicles changing lanes and a cyclist on the left side.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, moving steadily along the bike lane. 2) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily in the same lane. 3) Right side: A red car, approximately 10 meters away, changing lanes. 4) Front: A black car, approximately 15 meters away, changing lanes.

characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of a red car, driver of a white car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through a busy urban intersection. A black sedan is seen cutting into the lane from the left side, causing the self-driving vehicle to slow down. The red car ahead is moving straight, while the white car on the right is preparing to turn left.
actions: The self-driving vehicle decelerates to avoid a collision with the black sedan that is cutting into its lane from the left side. The vehicle maintains a consistent speed to navigate through the intersection safely.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A black sedan, approximately 2 meters away, cutting into the lane abruptly. 2) Front: A red car, approximately 10 meters away, moving straight. 3) Right side: A white car, approximately 5 meters away, preparing to turn left.
